      <P> void setActionBar(P player, java.lang.String message)

      <P> void setTabBar(P player, java.lang.String header, java.lang.String footer)
      Sets the header and footer of the given player tab bar.
      <P> void setTitle(P player, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String subTitle, int fadeIn, int stay, int fadeOut)
      Sets the title of the given player for the amount of stay ticks. Optionally shows a subTitle and displays a fadeIn and fadeOut effect in ticks.
